name: vaultwarden
description: Vaultwarden is a self-hosted Bitwarden-compatible server written in Rust. It provides the backend for web, mobile, and browser clients to store and sync encrypted passwords and secrets.

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Store and sync passwords, passkeys, and credentials across all devices securely

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Use official Bitwarden clients on web, desktop, mobile, and browser extensions

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: Encrypt all data with your master password before it leaves your device

features.title: Two-Factor Authentication
features.description: Protect your vault with 2FA using TOTP, WebAuthn, or other methods

features.title: Password Generator
features.description: Generate strong, random passwords with customizable length and character sets

features.title: File Attachments
features.description: Attach files to vault items for storing documents and certificates
